## GameClient.reconnect() method

断线重连, 失败的话要看code, ErrorCodes.AuthReconnectionFail 表示逻辑拒绝,不需要重连

**Signature:**

```typescript
reconnect(): Promise<IResult<null>>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[IResult](./tsgf-sdk.iresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;null&gt;&gt;
